chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (z t u : dart), expf m z t -> expf m t u -> expf m z u

Premises:
expf = fun (m : fmap) (x y : dart) => inv_hmap m /\ MF.expo m x y : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
dart = nat : Set
MA0.expo_trans : forall (m : fmap) (z t u : dart), MA0.expo m z t -> MA0.expo m t u -> MA0.expo m z u
expf_symm : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), expf m z t -> expf m t z
expfo_expf : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> expfo m x z t < -> expf m z t
MF.expo_symm : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m z t -> MF.expo m t z
expfo = fun (m : fmap) (x z t : dart) => expf (L (B m zero x) zero x (A m zero x)) z t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
expf_refl : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> expf m z z
MA0.ex_i : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m t -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem m z in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb m z in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t}
MF.expo_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> {MF.expo m z t} + {~ MF.expo m z t}
MA0.L2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (MA0.f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t
MA0.L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (MA0.f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
MA0.PL2 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (MA0.f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
MA0.ex_i_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t}
expf_planar_rcp_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar (L m zero x y) -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar m
expf_planar_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar (L m zero x y)
expf_planar_rcp_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar (L m one x y) -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar m
expf_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar (L m one x y)
weak_planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar m < -> planar (L m one x y)
weak_planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar m < -> planar (L m zero x y)
MA0.P4 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds s t -> (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z s in let nr := MA0.Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t -> {i : nat | (i < nr)%nat /\ Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t} : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Set
planar_I : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart) (t : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_I m x -> planar (I m x t p)
MA0.between = fun (m : fmap) (z v t : dart) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exists i j : nat, Iter (MA0.f m) i z = v /\ Iter (MA0.f m) j z = t /\ (i <= j < MA0.Iter_upb m z)%nat : fmap -> dart -> dart -> dart -> Prop
planarity_criterion_RCP_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
planarity_criterion_RCP_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y
planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y
expf_dec : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), {expf m x y} + {~ expf m x y}
planarity_crit_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> planar m /\ (~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y)
planarity_crit_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar (L m one x y) < -> planar m /\ (~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y))
MA0.expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (MA0.f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MF.expo = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) => exd m z /\ (exists i : nat, Iter (MF.f m) i z = t) : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
OMEGA7 : forall x y z t : Z, z > 0 -> t > 0 -> 0 <= x -> 0 <= y -> 0 <= x * z + y * t
MF.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> McF.f_1 m (McF.f m z) = z
succ_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m z
exd_not_nil : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> z <> nil
MA1.degree_bound : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> (MA1.degree m z <= ndN m)%nat
MF.expo_refl : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> MF.expo m z z
McA1.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m Md1.k (cA m Md1.k z) = z
MF.exds_orb_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exds (MF.Iter_orb m x) z -> exd m z
exd_cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA_1 m k z) -> exd m z
cA_1_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (cA m k z) = z

``` 
intros m z t u H1 H2.
intros H3 H4.
apply expf_symm in H3.
apply (expf_planar_rcp_0 m z t u) in H2.
apply (expf_planar_rcp_1 m t u z) in H2.
apply (weak_planarity_criterion_1 m t u) in H2.
apply (planarity_crit_1 m t u) in H2.
apply H2.
apply H4.
```

original: intros m z t u H1 H2. intros H3 H4. apply expf_symm in H3. apply (expf_planar_rcp_0 m z t u) in H2. apply (expf_planar_rcp_1 m t u z) in H2. apply (weak_planarity_criterion_1 m t u) in H2. apply (planarity_crit_1 m t u) in H2. apply H2. apply H4.
